roleset.name: divide into two parts by cutting through or across

role.descr: focus, first mention of entity intersecting another
thing arg0 is intersecting, entity divided in two

example.name: Intersecting ideas
example.text: A step that the Prime Minister seemed eager for the Arab League to welcome, even if his positions intersected with Moussa in not calling this movement an initiative.
example.arg: in not calling this movement an initiative
